text: The Siege of Vicksburg was a major battle of the American Civil War.Timothy B. Smith, Champion Hill: Decisive Battle for Vicksburg (New York: Savas Beatie, 2006), p. xiii It took place in Mississippi from May 18 to July 4, 1863. Union general Ulysses S. Grant surrounded the city of Vicksburg, Mississippi. The Confederate Army, commanded by John C. Pemberton, surrendered on July 4. Now the Union forces controlled the Mississippi River. == References == Category:American Civil War battles Category:1863 in the United States Vicksburg Category:History of Mississippi
title: Siege of Vicksburg
